title: Senior Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a skilled Senior Frontend Developer to lead our next-generation web applications. Must have expertise in React and modern JavaScript.

title: Full Stack Engineer
description: Join our team as a Full Stack Engineer to work on exciting projects using Node.js, Express, and a PostgreSQL database. Remote work is available.

title: UI/UX Designer
description: We need a talented UI/UX Designer to create stunning user interfaces and seamless user experiences. Adobe XD and Figma skills are a must.
